Research Retreat Program

Detailed Program

  • Day 1, Sunday April 15th
  • Day 2, Monday April 16th
  • Day 3, Tuesday April 17th

Day 1, Sunday April 15th

Time Task
3:00-3:45 Arrival & Poster Setup
4:00-5:30 Welcome & Power-Pitch Research Session 1 ​(moderators: Yan Li & Galateia Kazakia)
Metabolic imaging of infection using PET and Hyperpolarized 13C MR spectroscopy - David Wilson
Multimodality NeuroImaging to track Alzheimer disease pathology spread - Duygu Tosun
Detection of Bone Marrow Lesions Using Dual Energy CT - Ramya Srinivasan
Power Pitch Talks: Group I
5:30-6:30 Get-to-know-your-colleagues (moderators: Maryam Vareth, Caroline Jordan & Sue Noworolski)
6:30-8:00 Dinner
7:15-7:45 Overview of Department Research Enterprise & Future Visions - Christopher Hess & Sharmila Majumdar
8:00-10:30 Poster Session Group I & Reception

Day 2, Monday April 16th

Time Task
7:30-8:30 Breakfast Buffet in Flamingo Conference Room
8:30-9:45 Scientific Session II ( moderators: Jing Liu & Joseph Vu)
Convolutional Neural Network for Detection of Pneumothorax - John Mongan
Clinical Translation of 1H MR Spectroscopy at 3T & Beyond - Yan Li
Power Pitch Talks: Group 2
9:45-10:15 Radiology Resource Overview ( moderator: Emma Baharoos)
CRC Resources - Kenneth Gao
PACS Air - John Mongan
Info Commons - Sharmila Majumdar
10:15-10:30 Break
10:30-12:00 RIG/SRG Overview Sessions (moderators: Janine Lupo & Maryam Vareth)
AIT - Dan Vigneron
Body - Sue Noworolski
Breast - Nola Hylton
Cardiovascular - Jing Liu
MSK - Matt Bucknor
Brain - Bill Dillon
PICT / CIR - Sarah Nelson
12:00-1:30 Lunch Buffet
1:30-3:30 Indoor Activities
Get-to-know-your-colleagues (moderators: Maryam Vareth, Caroline Jordan & Sue Noworolski)
3:30-4:15 Battle of the Modalities Debate ( moderators: Valentina Pedoia & Eugene Ozhinsky)
Guest Panel: Dan V, Sharmila M, Henry V, Emma B, Enrique M, Galateia K, Peder L
4:15-4:30 Break
4:30-6:15 Breakout Session #1
1) Pulse Sequences: RTHawk & Adie – Eugene O. & Joseph Vu
2) Deep learning Beginner: CNNs 101 – Valentina Pedoia
3) Deep learning Advanced: Segmentation/Classification – Peter Chang
6:30-8:00 Dinner
6:45-7:10 UCSF New Faculty Highlight - Ashish Raj
8:00-9:00 External Keynote speaker - Fausto Milletari, Senior Solutions Deep Learning Architect at NVIDIA
9:00-11:00 Poster Session Group 2 & Reception

Day 3, Tuesday April 17th

Time Task
7:30-8:45 Breakfast Buffet in Flamingo Conference Room
9:00-9:30 Senior Faculty Career Reflections Talk - John Kurhanewicz
9:30-10:00 Reflections & Feedback of Department Discussion - Sharmila Majumdar et al.
10:00-10:15 Break
10:15-11:25 The Role of Imaging outside of Radiology ( moderator: Sue Noworolski & Caroline Jordan )
Radiation Oncology: Mekhail Anwar
Psychology: Judith Ford
PT: Michael Samaan
11:30-12:30 Breakout Session # 2: Career Development for All Stages
1) Postdocs & Graduate Students: Allyson Spence from OCPD
2) Career advancement for Staff : Enrique Menendez & Chris Sotto
3) Junior faculty & Non-faculty Academics: Nola Hylton et al.
12:30-1:30 Lunch & Departure
